showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // “Right!
The next sector it is!!”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});

dialogStrings:
“Need a heli-taxi?
Only in Junon!”{PAUSE}“Free
to Air Force personnel!”
{CHOICE}Sure
{CHOICE}Nope

“Just holler when you want a ride!”{PAUSE}“But if you get airsick easily,
maybe you'd better not go.”

“Then outside Junon it is!
Take care!!”
